warning-temporary: Temporarily disabled due to significant changes in game API that made this specific feature work
Command.OpenCloseLid.Name: (Dana Tweaks) Open or close the crate lid
Command.RemoveOrAddLabel.Name: (Dana Tweaks) Remove or add parchment on crate
Command.Error.NoLabel: No parchment in hand or on crate
RemoveBookSignature: Remove book signature (you must be the author of this book)
crock-seal: Drop fat or beeswax here to seal it
game:placefailure-danatweaks-omnirotatab: Can't place. Try other mode, e.g. 'Auto'
Config.Setting.ExtinctSubmergedTorchInEv: Extinct Submerged Torch In Every Slot
Config.Setting.BranchCutter: Add second mode to shears to drop whole leaves blocks
Config.Setting.GroundStorageImmersiveCra: Allow immersive crafting in ground storage using grid recipes with 2 ingredients
Config.Setting.GroundStorageLiquidIntera: Allow liquid interaction with liquid containers in ground storage
Config.Setting.GroundStorageParticles: Emit smoke particles for pots and crucibles placed on the ground
Config.Setting.HalloweenEveryDay: Allow to carve pumpkins any time of year
Config.Setting.PlanksInPitKiln: Allow to use planks in pit kiln
Config.Setting.RackableFirestarter: Allow to store firestarter on tool racks
Config.Setting.RegrowResin: Generate resin on trees grown from saplings
Config.Setting.ShelvablePie: Allow to store pies on shelves
Config.Setting.WaxCheeseOnGround: Wax cheese placed on the ground
Config.Setting.CrateOpenCloseLid: Allow to open/close crate lid with command
Config.Setting.CrateRemoveOrAddLabel: Allow to remove/add crate label with command
Config.Setting.ResinOnAllSides: Show resin on all sides of log with resin
Config.Setting.AutoClose.Description: Auto close doors, trapdoors, gates, fences etc.
Config.Setting.ModesPerRowForVoxelRecipe: Enable 'modes per row for voxel recipes' tweak
Config.Setting.ColorsPerRowForWaypointWi: Enable 'colors per row for waypoint window' tweak
Config.Setting.IconsPerRowForWaypointWin: Enable 'icons per row for waypoint window' tweak
